channel.title: Unable to get any 508 to compile or run - please help
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm new to this, and I am trying to find a base I can work with that works. I have some 317's that work OK, but I am having trouble getting those to do basic things like Thieving, etc. and the graphics are a little weak. As far as 508's go, I have downloaded Davidscape, Butter's Dream, and Palidino's, but they all give me the same problem. When I try to run the Server, I get this error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit.
I'm assuming that means the Server.java file was not compiled, but it WAS. It is in the same folder as the .java files.
Am I missing something? Or do I have to use the 317's?
I admit, I am confused by all the "Bin" and "Bulby" folders and such, so I might not have it right. Also, I have not found any tutorials on how to actually set up a 508 that explains this issue of the various folders, and how they work.

item.title: Unable to get any 508 to compile or run - please help
item.dc:creator: @LokaiNY LokaiNY
item.description:
@LokaiNY wrote:

[quote="_™, post:7, topic:290762"]Under your runserver, make a new file called run.bat and use this inside of it:

@echo off title Run java Server[/quote]
Got this:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server (wrong name: B
ulby/Server)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit.

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to get any 508 to compile or run - please help

item.title: Unable to get any 508 to compile or run - please help
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Under your runserver, make a new file called run.bat and use this inside of it:

@echo off title Run java Server

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to get any 508 to compile or run - please help

item.title: Unable to get any 508 to compile or run - please help
item.dc:creator: @LokaiNY LokaiNY
item.description:
@LokaiNY wrote:

_™:

Holy crap, a first timer that can type and provide with information… Is Server.class in the same directory as the file running it? (the batch)

see image:

http://www.frontiernet.net/~tvbowman/lokai/folder.jpg

I have tried it several ways, with the batch file in the original folder (“DavidScape\cmd”) with …\bin\Bulby as part of the command, and in this case, where I moved the Runserver.bat file into the Bubly folder itself. Neither way worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to get any 508 to compile or run - please help
item.dc:creator: @LokaiNY LokaiNY
item.description:
@LokaiNY wrote:

Hello,

I’m new to this, and I am trying to find a base I can work with that works. I have some 317’s that work OK, but I am having trouble getting those to do basic things like Thieving, etc. and the graphics are a little weak. As far as 508’s go, I have downloaded Davidscape, Butter’s Dream, and Palidino’s, but they all give me the same problem. When I try to run the Server, I get this error:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)

I’m assuming that means the Server.java file was not compiled, but it WAS. It is in the same folder as the .java files.

Am I missing something? Or do I have to use the 317’s?

I admit, I am confused by all the “Bin” and “Bulby” folders and such, so I might not have it right. Also, I have not found any tutorials on how to actually set up a 508 that explains this issue of the various folders, and how they work.
